Author: alcoholhas2manykcal
Text: Thank you, you've articulated this exceptionally well.

Author: NewBullMoose
Text: That's the worst part about the label of a disorder: it doesn't just highlight what's wrong and tell you how to fix it, it changes how you're perceived in any remotely relevant way.   * You're not in a great mood today? You must not have eaten enough. *  You don't want a slice of this pie? Impossible that you genuinely don't like that flavor; you're anorexic, that means you're never allowed to turn down food again.   And on and on it goes. I feel you.
